components.description: A flatbread, like pita, stuffed with lettuce, tomato, and/or meat. Resembles a doner kebab, falafel, shawarma, or gyro sandwich, popular in the Middle East and the Mediterranean. Some platforms have red onion and cucumber. Not to be confused with ðŸ«“ Flatbread or ðŸŒ¯ Burrito.
components.title: Stuffed Flatbread

description: A flatbread, like pita, stuffed with lettuce, tomato, and/or meat. Resembles a doner kebab, falafel, shawarma, or gyro sandwich, popular in the Middle East and the Mediterranean. Some platforms have red onion and cucumber. Not to be confused with ðŸ«“ Flatbread or ðŸŒ¯ Burrito.
title: Stuffed Flatbread

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Food symbol
emoji_net_data.definition: Flatbread containing items such as salad, sliced meat, or falafel. A fast food item popular throughout parts of the middle east. May come in http://emojipedia.org/stuffed-flatbread/
emoji_net_data.name: stuffed flatbread

bn:00048701n: Variety of skewered meals originating in the Middle East
A dish of pieces of meat, fish, or vegetables roasted on a skewer or spit.
Cubes of meat marinated and cooked on a skewer usually with vegetables
A dish made with small pieces of meat and vegetables which are cooked on a skewer.

Kebab, is a Middle Eastern dish of pieces of meat, fish, or vegetables roasted or grilled on a skewer or spit originating in the Middle East, and later adopted in Central Asia and by the regions of the former Mongol Empire and later Ottoman Empire, before spreading worldwide.
A dish with pieces of roasted or grilled meat; Eastern Mediterranean origin
Meat and vegetables on a skewer.

bn:00035101n: A flatbread is a bread made with flour, water, and salt, and then thoroughly rolled into flattened dough.
Any of various breads made from usually unleavened dough
Simple flat and round bread made of grain and water, often without yeast or sourdough.
Any of various kinds of unleavened bread

bn:00032782n: A Middle Eastern food in the form of balls made from chickpeas and other ingredients. Often served in a pita.
Falafel is a deep-fried ball or patty made from ground chickpeas, fava beans, or both.
A fried ball or patty made from spiced fava beans and/or chickpeas.
Small croquette of mashed chick peas or fava beans seasoned with sesame seeds

bn:00035650n: Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

apple_vendor_description: The stuffed flatbread emoji on Apple devices is a warm and inviting depiction of a folded pastry, perhaps a gyro or a falafel wrap. Appleâ€™s characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting give the bread a soft, toasted texture and hint at the delicious fillings within. Its gently rounded form and inviting appearance make it a delightful way to express hunger, share food-related plans, or simply convey a sense of comfort and satisfaction in messages.
